message:
[Action Options]
1) PICK <handle>.
2) OPEN <handle>.
3) PICK <object> PLACE <location>, <object> can be either cup or mug; PICK and PLACE is considered one single ACTION, i.e. you must always PICK and PLACE together
4) WAIT: stays at current position, choose WAIT to hold the door open.
<handle> must be either left or right door handle. Only OPEN a door after you already PICKed its handle, after you OPENed a door, must WAIT at the same spot to hold it open. 
<object> must be either mug or cup, <location> must be the correct coaster.

[Action Output Instruction]
Must first output 'EXECUTE
', then give **exactly** one action per robot, put each on a new line.
Example: 'EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION PICK mug PLACE mug_coaster
NAME Bob ACTION WAIT
NAME Chad ACTION OPEN left_door_handle
'

[History]
== Round#0 ==
[Chat History]
[Alice]:
Hello Bob and Chad, it seems Chad cannot reach the right_door_handle. Let's revise our plan. 

Bob, since you can reach the right_door_handle, please PICK it instead of waiting. Chad, you can WAIT for now.

My action for this round remains the same: PICK left_door_handle
What do you think?
[Bob]:
Hello Alice and Chad, I understand the situation now. I will PICK the right_door_handle instead. Chad, please WAIT for now.

My action for this round: PICK right_door_handle
What do you think?
[Chad]:
Hello Alice and Bob, I understand the revised plan. Since I cannot reach the right_door_handle, I will WAIT for now as suggested.

My action for this round: WAIT
What do you think?
[Alice]:
Great, we all have our actions for this round. Let's proceed with the plan.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION PICK left_door_handle
NAME Bob ACTION PICK right_door_handle
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT
[Executed Action]
Alice: PICK left_door_handle
Bob: PICK right_door_handle
Chad: WAIT
== Round#1 ==
[Chat History]
[Alice]:
Hello Bob and Chad, now that we have picked the door handles, let's proceed to open the cabinet doors. I will OPEN the left_door_handle, and Bob, you should OPEN the right_door_handle. Chad, please continue to WAIT for now.

My action for this round: OPEN left_door_handle
What do you think?
[Bob]:
Hello Alice and Chad, I agree with the plan. I will OPEN the right_door_handle, and Chad, please continue to WAIT for now.

My action for this round: OPEN right_door_handle
What do you think?
[Chad]:
Hello Alice and Bob, I understand the plan. I will continue to WAIT for now as you both open the cabinet doors.

My action for this round: WAIT
What do you think?
[Alice]:
Great, we all have our actions for this round. Let's proceed with the plan.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION OPEN left_door_handle
NAME Bob ACTION OPEN right_door_handle
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT
[Executed Action]
Alice: OPEN left_door_handle
Bob: OPEN right_door_handle
Chad: WAIT
== Round#2 ==
[Chat History]
[Alice]:
Hello Bob and Chad, I made a mistake in my previous plan. I need to first let go of the left_door_handle before I can pick the mug. So, I will WAIT for this round. Bob, please continue to hold the right_door_handle open. Chad, please PICK the cup and PLACE it on the cup_coaster.

My action for this round: WAIT
What do you think?
[Bob]:
Hello Alice and Chad, I understand the revised plan. Alice, you can WAIT for this round. I will continue to hold the right_door_handle open. Chad, please PICK the cup and PLACE it on the cup_coaster.

My action for this round: WAIT
What do you think?
[Chad]:
Hello Alice and Bob, I understand the revised plan. Alice, you can WAIT for this round while you let go of the left_door_handle. Bob, please continue to hold the right_door_handle open. I will PICK the cup and PLACE it on the cup_coaster.

My action for this round: PICK cup PLACE cup_coaster
What do you think?
[Alice]:
Alice:
Great, we all have our actions for this round. Let's proceed with the plan.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION WAIT
NAME Chad ACTION PICK cup PLACE cup_coaster
[Executed Action]
Alice: WAIT
Bob: WAIT
Chad: PICK cup PLACE cup_coaster
== Current Round ==


You are Alice, collaborate with Bob, Chad to pick a mug and a cup out of cabinet, and place them on correct coasters.
Both left and right cabinet doors should be OPENed and held open, while anything inside can be PICKed.
You must coordinate to complete the task most efficiently while avoiding collision.
You can only reach left_door_handle, mug, cup.
At current round:
left door is open, left_door_handle is at (-0.4, -0.0, 0.5), right door is open, right_door_handle is at (-0.5, 1.1, 0.5), 
mug is inside cabinet; cup is on its coaster;
Your gripper is at (-0.4 -0.0 0.5), holding left_door_handle, 
Bob's gripper is at (-0.5 1.1 0.5), holding right_door_handle, 
Chad's gripper is at (0.7 1.2 0.4), holding nothing, 
Think step-by-step about the task and others' response. Carefully check and correct them if they made a mistake. 
Improve your plans if given [Environment Feedback].

When you respond, tell others about your goal and all constraints. Respond very concisely but informatively, and do not repeat what others have said.
Discuss together to come up with the best plan. Never forget you are Alice! Never forget you can only reach left_door_handle, mug, cup!
Propose exactly one action for yourself at the **current** round, select from [Action Options]. At least one robot should be acting, you can't all WAIT.
End your response by either: 1) output PROCEED, if the plans require further discussion, or 2) If everyone has made proposals and got approved, output EXECUTE and the final plan, must strictly follow [Action Output Instruction]!


[Previous Chat]
[Alice]:
Hello Bob and Chad, now that the cabinet doors are open and Chad has placed the cup on its coaster, I will let go of the left_door_handle and PICK the mug. Bob, please continue to hold the right_door_handle open. Chad, you can WAIT for this round.

My action for this round: PICK mug PLACE mug_coaster
What do you think?
[Bob]:
Hello Alice and Chad, I understand the plan. Alice, you can PICK the mug and PLACE it on the mug_coaster. I will continue to hold the right_door_handle open. Chad, please WAIT for this round.

My action for this round: WAIT
What do you think?
[Chad]:
Hello Alice and Bob, I understand the plan. Alice, you can PICK the mug and PLACE it on the mug_coaster. Bob, please continue to hold the right_door_handle open. I will WAIT for this round.

My action for this round: WAIT
What do you think?
[Alice]:
Great, we all have our actions for this round. Let's proceed with the plan.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION PICK mug PLACE mug_coaster
NAME Bob ACTION WAIT
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT

This previous response from [Alice] failed to parse!: 'Great, we all have our actions for this round. Let's proceed with the plan.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION PICK mug PLACE mug_coaster
NAME Bob ACTION WAIT
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT'
Robot Alice is already holding an object, can't pick another one. Re-format to strictly follow [Action Output Instruction]!
You are Alice, your response is:

Hello Bob and Chad, I made a mistake in my previous plan. I need to first let go of the left_door_handle before I can pick the mug. So, I will WAIT for this round. Bob, please continue to hold the right_door_handle open. Chad, you can also WAIT for this round.

My action for this round: WAIT
What do you think?
